resources.string: This is a Kotlin Multiplatform demo app using the public GitHub REST API. The development of the application took place in 4 stages.
Application on Jetpack Compose, MVVM and all the latest stack surrounding this technology.
Application on swiftUI, MVVM and the whole latest stack surrounding this technology.
Development of a \"shared\" Kotlin Multiplatform module for interaction with applications.
React app using the \"shared\" module we developed earlier. That\'s all.
